snippet.title: Hades II - The Olympic Update Trailer
snippet.description:
Now in Early Access, Hades II is the bewitching sequel to the award-winning rogue-like dungeon crawler, and just got its first Major Update! Featuring an all-new region, a powerful new weapon, new allies, and much more.

Music: "Olympus Aflame" by Darren Korb and Austin Wintory, and "Lap of Luxury (feat. Kristin Naigus)" by Darren Korb, from the Hades II Original Soundtrack.

Play Hades II on Steam:  http://supergiant.games/hades2steam
Play Hades II on Epic Games Store: http://supergiant.games/hades2egs

Hades II is a trademark of Supergiant Games, LLC. The soundtrack is © 2024 Supergiant Games, LLC. All rights reserved.
